testcase.classname: Feature to test google search functionality

testcase.system-out: Given Browser is open.......................................................passed And user is on google search page...........................................passed When user enters a keywoard in search box...................................passed And click enter.............................................................passed Then user is navigated to search result.....................................passed

testcase.name: Check login is Successful with valid credintials
